title: Add hero header images for each main tab (Task List, Dinner Rota, Calendar, People)

requirements.text: Add a reusable hero/header section component that can be placed at the top of each main tab view and renders a static hero image with consistent styling (responsive, rounded corners, gradient overlay for text readability, and accessible alt text).

quotes: Include some nice header hero images for each of the tasks, for each of the tabs, task list, calendar, people.

acceptanceCriteria: A reusable hero/header component exists and can be used by Task List, Dinner Rota, Calendar, and People views.
Hero section is responsive (maintains aspect ratio, crops via object-cover), has rounded corners, and uses an overlay to ensure any text remains readable.
All hero images have non-empty, descriptive alt text in English.

requirements.text: Add a distinct hero/header image at the top of each main tab view: Task List (frontend/src/components/TaskList.tsx), Dinner Rota (frontend/src/components/DinnerRota.tsx), Calendar (frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx), and People (frontend/src/components/People.tsx).

quotes: Include some nice header hero images for each of the tasks, for each of the tabs, task list, calendar, people.

acceptanceCriteria: Task List shows a hero image above the "Household Tasks" header content.
Dinner Rota shows a hero image in its header area (keeping or replacing the existing image block, but using the new consistent hero/header styling).
Calendar shows a hero image above the "Calendar View" header content.
People shows a hero image above the "People" header content.
No hero images are loaded via backend; all are served as static assets.

requirements.text: Add the generated hero images to the frontend as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them via absolute paths (e.g., /assets/generated/...).

quotes: Include some nice header hero images for each of the tasks, for each of the tabs, task list, calendar, people.

acceptanceCriteria: All new hero image files exist under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Each tab references its corresponding hero image path and renders successfully in the browser without 404s.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI components).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
nonGoals: Fixing backend data persistence/stable storage issues.
Adding new tabs or changing tab navigation structure.
Implementing image upload or user-customizable hero images.

required: Warm, cozy task-management themed hero banner with subtle household/clipboard motifs (hero-task-list.dim_1600x400.jpg)
Warm, family dinner/cooking themed hero banner with kitchen elements (hero-dinner-rota.dim_1600x400.jpg)
Clean planning/calendar themed hero banner with date grid motifs (hero-calendar.dim_1600x400.jpg)
Friendly people/community themed hero banner with abstract avatars/shapes (hero-people.dim_1600x400.jpg)

preferencesToAdd: Use English for any user-facing text.
